fields.name: Enact Ordinance (Charge 700%):
fields.value: All players with this ability contribute to and share charge for this ability while they have the ability. If at least three players have this ability, a majority of players with this ability use it to name the same rule, and the rule does not cause town to instantly win (host discretion); charge will be spent, the host will anounce the Town Council has enacted the rule (including what the rule is), and the host will begin enforcing the rule starting the with the day phase. This ability cannot be roleblocked.

fields.name: Appoint Partisans (4x):
fields.value: Grant another player the Enact Ordinance ability.

fields.name: Hire Bodyguard (1x, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Double your defense power tonight (takes effect before any increases, but after any decreases).

fields.name: Shake Hands (Passive):
fields.value: You may request three Hello Neighbors each day.
